outdoors.name: The Street
outdoors.text: You can see the subway station down the block. But are you sure you want to go home already? Why don't you pop into a random room instead?

buttons.text: I take it back. Teleport me!!
Let me get on that damn train >:(

basementDoor.name: A Creepy-looking Basement
basementDoor.text: Are you sure you should be going down here?

buttons.text: Don't tell me what to do

basementStaircase.text: A dusty staircase leads downward into darkness. The light from upstairs barely penetrates into the gloom. As you put your foot on the first step, it creaks loudly under you.
